184.heading: La Forge, Geordi.
184.title: "Das Mainstream-Monster" p. 40 in Carpe Noctem
184.author: Jamiri.
notes: Summary (by M. Harbeck): Dealing with the problems of getting older as perceived in changes in the Star Trek series (e.g. Scotty being exchanged for Mr. Laforge in "Next Generation"). Jamiri tries to exorcize the so-called Mainstream-Monster with stuff that always keeps its value.
